mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AS dayPriceLogSeq /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_DT AS exeDt /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.CACHE_END_TM AS cacheEndTm /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_STATUS AS exeStatus /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG_PK(P),SYS_C0011144(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_DT = #{exeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.CACHE_END_TM = #{cacheEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AS dayPriceLogSeq /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_DT AS exeDt /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.CACHE_END_TM AS cacheEndTm /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_STATUS AS exeStatus /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_DT = #{exeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.CACHE_END_TM = #{cacheEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
ORDER BY EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG SET /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ EXE_DT = #{exeDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,CACHE_END_TM = #{cacheEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* CACHE 만료 시간, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 실행 상태, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
